The rich, warm look of fine furniture...with protective lock¬

player-recorders and monitor in a variety of arrangements
for small or large groups. Each accepts most 25” color
receivers. Each has the strength and protection of heavy
gauge, ebony-finished steel accented by the beauty of
wooden doors finished in walnut-grain, mar-resistant
laminate. Send today for FREE full-color catalog
